column3: my only complain is it's a bit pricey...$12 for the shot
column4: $8 for the sangria and $16 for the breakfast burger...They do
column6: have a $32 special that includes an entree and unlimited mimosas or bloody marys
column7: but you'd still have to get at least 2 or 3 drinks to get your money's worth. Would recommend overall though!
